summary: This is a lieutenant's log and daily activity report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 3, 2019. It documents routine operations and inmate counts, and is significant as it was created the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, with his inmate number (76318-054) and housing location (9 South) recorded in the daily count.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine daily operations and inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, documenting Jeffrey Epstein as an inmate in housing unit 9 South.

keyFacts: The document is a lieutenant's log and daily activity report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated Saturday, August 3, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate with the number 76318-054, housed in unit 9 South.
This routine administrative document was created the day before Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 10, 2019.
